name: The Force Awakens Takeover
description:
Overlay takeover for release of The Force Awakens, featuring an overlay to choose between the light and dark sides, which then toggles styling & content to reflect which side was chosen.

Programmed content can be configured to appear on the "light side," "dark side," or the default of "Neutral" where the content will appear regardless of which side is selected.

Users can also toggle their selection after the initial overlay state, which swaps the entire page theming and select content
